Lure.name: Lure
Lure.description: Fishing lure used to attract and catch fish.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: Unique identifier assigned to the lure model.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: Name of the brand that produces the lure.

attributes.name: Weight
attributes.description: Weight of the lure in grams.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: Material used to make the lure.

attributes.name: Length
attributes.description: Length of the lure in millimeters or centimeters.

attributes.name: Color
attributes.description: Color of the lure.

attributes.name: Lure Type
attributes.description: Type or category of the lure.

attributes.name: Position
attributes.description: Specific position or code associated with the lure.

attributes.name: Action
attributes.description: Type of action exhibited by the lure in the water.

attributes.name: Item
attributes.description: Specific item or set of items included in the lure package.
examples: Hard Plastic Minow Lures for Fishing Artificial Crankbait Swim Baits
Mixed Color Metal Spoon Fishing Lure Kits

attributes.name: Quantity
attributes.description: Number of lures included in a package.

attributes.name: Size
attributes.description: Size specification of the lure.

Baseball Caps.name: Baseball Caps
Baseball Caps.description: Baseball caps are a type of headwear commonly worn for casual and sporty occasions.

attributes.name: Pattern
attributes.description: The pattern of the baseball cap.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The brand name of the baseball cap.

attributes.name: Gender
attributes.description: The gender for which the baseball cap is designed.

attributes.name: Style
attributes.description: The style of the baseball cap.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: The material used in the construction of the baseball cap.

attributes.name: Department Name
attributes.description: The department or age group for which the baseball cap is intended.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The model number of the baseball cap.
examples: SEAL Seal Tactical Cap for Men

Swimwear.name: Swimwear
Swimwear.description: Swimwear is a category of clothing designed for swimming or other water-based activities.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The brand name of the swimwear product.

attributes.name: Pattern
attributes.description: The pattern or design of the swimwear product.

attributes.name: Gender
attributes.description: The target gender for the swimwear product.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The unique model number of the swimwear product.

attributes.name: Color
attributes.description: The color of the swimwear product.

attributes.name: Style
attributes.description: The style or design of the swimwear product.

attributes.name: Feature
attributes.description: The special features or characteristics of the swimwear product.
examples: Leopard High Cut Sexy One Piece Swimsuit

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: A brief description of the swimwear product.

attributes.name: Season
attributes.description: The season or occasion for which the swimwear product is suitable.

Helmet.name: Helmet
Helmet.description: Protective headgear for various sports and activities.

attributes.name: Sport
attributes.description: The specific sport or activity the helmet is designed for.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: The materials used in the construction of the helmet.

attributes.name: Applicable People
attributes.description: The target demographic for the helmet.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The brand or manufacturer of the helmet.

attributes.name: Feature
attributes.description: Key features or functionalities of the helmet.

attributes.name: Style
attributes.description: The style or design of the helmet.

attributes.name: Season
attributes.description: The season or weather conditions the helmet is suitable for.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The unique model number or identifier of the helmet.

attributes.name: Head Circumference
attributes.description: The range of head circumferences the helmet can accommodate.

Shirts.name: Shirts
Shirts.description: Shirts for various sports and activities.

attributes.name: Sport Type
attributes.description: The type of sport or activity the shirt is designed for.

attributes.name: Gender
attributes.description: The intended gender for the shirt.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The brand name of the shirt.

attributes.name: Sleeve Length(cm)
attributes.description: The length of the sleeves in centimeters.

attributes.name: Fabric Type
attributes.description: The type of fabric used for the shirt.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The model number of the shirt.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: The material used for the shirt.

attributes.name: Feature
attributes.description: Special features of the shirt.

attributes.name: Style
attributes.description: The style or design of the shirt.

Fishing Rod.name: Fishing Rod
Fishing Rod.description: A product category for fishing rods.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The brand name of the fishing rod.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: The material used in the fishing rod.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The model number of the fishing rod.

attributes.name: Section
attributes.description: The number of sections in the fishing rod.

attributes.name: Hardness
attributes.description: The hardness of the fishing rod.

attributes.name: Power
attributes.description: The power rating of the fishing rod.

Eyewear.name: Eyewear
Eyewear.description: Eyewear is a product category that includes various types of glasses and goggles for different sports and activities.

attributes.name: Sport Type
attributes.description: The sport type attribute specifies the specific sport or activity for which the eyewear is designed.

attributes.name: Gender
attributes.description: The gender attribute indicates the target gender for the eyewear.

attributes.name: Name
attributes.description: The name attribute represents the specific name or model of the eyewear.

attributes.name: Lens Height
attributes.description: The lens height attribute specifies the height of the lenses in the eyewear.

attributes.name: Lens Width
attributes.description: The lens width attribute indicates the width of the lenses in the eyewear.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The model number attribute represents the unique identifier or model number of the eyewear.

attributes.name: Frame Material
attributes.description: The frame material attribute specifies the material used for the frame of the eyewear.

attributes.name: Lenses Optical Attribute
attributes.description: The lenses optical attribute represents the optical properties or features of the lenses in the eyewear.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The brand name attribute indicates the brand or manufacturer of the eyewear.

attributes.name: Feature
attributes.description: The feature attribute represents the special features or characteristics of the eyewear.

attributes.name: Function
attributes.description: The function attribute specifies the specific function or purpose of the eyewear.

attributes.name: Frame Color
attributes.description: The frame color attribute indicates the color of the frame of the eyewear.

attributes.name: Lenses Material
attributes.description: The lenses material attribute specifies the material used for the lenses in the eyewear.

attributes.name: Lenses Color
attributes.description: The lenses color attribute represents the color of the lenses in the eyewear.

attributes.name: Style
attributes.description: The style attribute indicates the style or design of the eyewear.

attributes.name: Eyewear Type
attributes.description: The eyewear type attribute specifies the type or category of the eyewear.

Guitar.name: Guitar
Guitar.description: A musical instrument with various attributes used to produce sound.

attributes.name: Back / Side Material
attributes.description: The material used for the back and sides of the guitar.

attributes.name: Body Material
attributes.description: The material used for the body of the guitar.

attributes.name: Fingerboard Material
attributes.description: The material used for the fingerboard of the guitar.

attributes.name: Bow Material
attributes.description: The material used for the bow of the guitar.

attributes.name: Tone Position
attributes.description: The number of tone positions on the guitar.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The unique model number of the guitar.

attributes.name: Pickup
attributes.description: The type of pickup used in the guitar.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The brand name of the guitar.

attributes.name: String Winder
attributes.description: The type of string winder used for the guitar.

Shorts.name: Shorts
Shorts.description: Shorts are a type of clothing typically worn during sports or leisure activities.

attributes.name: Sport Type
attributes.description: The type of sport for which the shorts are designed.

attributes.name: Gender
attributes.description: The intended gender for wearing the shorts.

attributes.name: Model Number
attributes.description: The unique identifier assigned to the shorts model.
examples: Aurora Trees Running Shorts Landscape Forest Nature

attributes.name: Pattern
attributes.description: The design pattern or style of the shorts.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The name of the brand that manufactures the shorts.

attributes.name: Feature
attributes.description: Special features or characteristics of the shorts.

attributes.name: Style
attributes.description: The overall style or fashion of the shorts.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: The primary material used in the construction of the shorts.

attributes.name: Color
attributes.description: The color of the shorts.

attributes.name: Fabric Type
attributes.description: The type of fabric used in the shorts.

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Additional descriptive information about the shorts.

attributes.name: Item
attributes.description: Additional item information related to the shorts.

Stove.name: Stove
Stove.description: A product category for stoves used for cooking or heating purposes.

attributes.name: Fuel
attributes.description: The type of fuel used to power the stove.

attributes.name: Stove Type
attributes.description: The specific type or design of the stove.

attributes.name: Brand Name
attributes.description: The brand or manufacturer of the stove.

attributes.name: Material
attributes.description: The material used to construct the stove.

attributes.name: Applicable Seasoning Type
attributes.description: The type of seasoning or fuel compatible with the stove.

attributes.name: Model
attributes.description: The specific model or name of the stove.
